response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for you at $1,500,000, and we believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand the importance of making a fair deal, so I propose a price that reflects its true worth while considering your expectations. My offer for this remarkable product is $1,200,000. I hope this proposal aligns with your financial considerations and allows us to move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
